meanings.definition: Not guilty of neglect or failure to take proper care.
meanings.sent1: She was praised for her nonnegligent behavior in handling the delicate equipment.
meanings.sent2: The nonnegligent driver followed all traffic rules and signals.
meanings.sent3: The nonnegligent student always remembered to bring extra pencils to class.
meanings.sent4: His nonnegligent approach to safety made him the most reliable team member.
meanings.sent5: The nonnegligent firefighter saved the kitten from the burning building.

meanings.sent1: The nonnegligent construction workers double-checked all measurements before building.
meanings.sent2: The nonnegligent babysitter kept a close eye on the children at all times.
meanings.sent3: The nonnegligent chef never burned the food, not even once.
meanings.sent4: Her nonnegligent attention to detail ensured the project's success.
meanings.sent5: The nonnegligent hiker always carried a map and compass on the trail.
